text: Alvin Keith McCants (April 19, 1968 â€“ September 2, 2021) was a professional American football linebacker and radio broadcaster. He played for six seasons in the National Football League (NFL) for the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, the Houston Oilers, and the Arizona Cardinals from 1990 to 1995. He was born in Mobile, Alabama. McCants died in St. Petersburg, Florida on September 2, 2021 from a drug overdose, aged 53. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American football linebackers Category:Tampa Bay Buccaneers players Category:Tennessee Titans players Category:Arizona Cardinals players Category:Sportspeople from Mobile, Alabama Category:American radio personalities Category:American sports commentators Category:Drug- related deaths in the United States
title: Keith McCants
